ON C.ID = R.CONSULTING_ID AND ROWNUM <= #{lecturePagination.page} * #{lecturePagination.rowCount} ) G ON M.ID = G.MEMBER_ID AND W > (#{lecturePagination.page} - 1) * #{lecturePagination.rowCount} AND REPLY_DEPTH = 0 AND G.CONSULTING_ID = #{consultingId}
